version_description: We heard your feedback loud and clear. The new picture interface is now strictly optional!

- As requested, several voices have been restored: slower, slowest, faster, fastest (was called rabbit), lower, higher, bathroom (was called reverb), "Long Echo" is now called "Canyon"
- Files are saved as .aiff
- Improved appearance for iPad
Voice Changer Plus has been updated with an all new design for iOS 7.
Great news: Now you can share recordings to Facebook for free!

- Now you can share with WhatsApp!
- Choose photo for sharing
- Email audio as .wav file
- bug fixes

Introducing Voice Packs! Get just the ones you want, or choose the Mega Pack to get all of them.

New Voices:

● Bad Harmony - World's worst choir!
● Bad Melody - Great for singing solo. Badly.
● Dax - Retro talking head!
● Blane - A dark knightmare
● Mosquito - So annoying!
● Robot 2 - A new take on an old favorite

NOTE: You will automatically get most voice packs for FREE if you ever bought an upgrade in the past.

Bug Fixed: Some users could not change photo for sharing

Did you know that ratings are reset with each new version? Even if you've rated Voice Changer Plus before, you can help us out a lot by leaving a review. Thanks for your support!

- Updates for iOS8 and new devices
- Simplified in-app purchase

If you enjoy using Voice Changer Plus, please consider leaving a nice review in the App Store. It really helps us out a lot!
Minor updates
iOS 9 compatibility
iOS 9 compatibility
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes
Fixed a bug where some pictures would be cropped incorrectly for video.

● Great news: No restrictions on saving and sharing recordings, for free!
● iCloud backup and sync! When you sign into your iCloud account, saved recordings are sent to private and secure iCloud storage for safekeeping and easy recovery. Voice Changer Plus still works if you choose not to sign in.
● Your list of recordings is automatically synced to all your devices. You can allow notifications to keep everything up to date quickly and silently.
● Recordings are now shared directly as audio files. Video files are still created for services that don’t support sound files, such as Facebook and Instagram. You can still save video to the camera roll.
● Import and Export functions let you access iCloud drive, Dropbox, Google Drive, and many other services and applications.
● Ringtones are now available through iTunes File Sharing instead of email.

Check out and enjoy this major free upgrade!
